resources.string: 1. I can find something positive in even the most difficult situations.
2. I actively keep in touch with friends and family.
4. When times get tough, I turn to friends/family for support.
5. When I find myself overwhelmed with stress, I shut down completely.
6. When I\'m feeling down, I remind myself to focus on the good things in my life instead of the bad.
7. When I have a difficult problem, I try to look at it from different angles in order to come up with a solution.
8. I refuse to give up, no matter how tough things get.
9. I believe that what can go wrong will go wrong.
10. I am grateful for what I have, and appreciate it.
11. I have a positive image of myself.
12. I try to eat healthy and exercise for my health.
14. I think the world is a good place.
15. I have very warm feelings towards almost everyone.
16. Do you have people you can talk to who understand what you\’re going through? If you don\’t think so, why do you think that\’s the case?
17. If you share your problems with people, how do you think they will react?
18. What changes can help you feel better right now?
19. Imagine you have all the money in the world for a week. You don\’t have to study, you don\’t have to work, anything is inside your hands. How would you spend this week?

20. It is summer and you\'re at the seaside. Feeling the warmness of the sand under your feet you\'re walking towards your family and friends. As you come closer you see that they\'re smiling happily and laughing. What might be the reason for their happiness?
21. Do you feel tired no matter how much you sleep? What kind of activities may improve your sleep quality and energize you?
